Logging.description: run_strategy.py does not log effective start date (after warmup)
Logging.fix_suggestion: Add logging of effective start date per PROCEDURES.md § 2.3

Meta Fields.description: Verify meta.json includes all required fields for reproducibility
Meta Fields.fix_suggestion: Ensure meta.json includes: run_id, start_date, end_date, strategy_profile, config_hash, canonical_window

Reproducibility.description: Verify YAML config files maintain deterministic ordering

Config Boundaries.description: allocator_v1.mode='precomputed' but precomputed_run_id is null - this will default to 'off' mode
Config Boundaries.fix_suggestion: Either set mode='off' or provide a default precomputed_run_id, or add validation
